body.name: Zinus 6 Inch Foam and Spring Mattress / CertiPUR-US Certified Foams / Mattress-in-a-Box, Narrow Twin, White
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 17 hrs 39 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: DURABLE COMFORT – When soft, yet durable foam layers combine with steel innersprings, a match made in mattress heaven happens, resulting in this supportive spring mattress with the right hint of conforming softness
TOP QUALITY LAYERS – 1 total inch durable high-density foam and a 5 inch base layer of heavy duty steel coils; ideal for stomach sleepers and petite to average weight individuals
CERTIPUR US CERTIFIED - Highest quality foam is CertiPUR US Certified for durability, performance, and content

EXPERTLY PACKAGED - Our technology allows this mattress to be efficiently compressed into one box that’s easily shipped and maneuvered into the bedroom; simply unbox, unroll and this mattress does the rest, expanding to its original shape within 72 hours
Worry-free 10 year limited warranty included; twin mattress supports a maximum weight of 250 lbs, while all other sizes can support up to 500 lbs
Please confirm measurements of third-party brand bed frames before pairing with the AmazonUs/ZINUS 6 Inch Foam and Spring Mattress, as compatibility is not guaranteed.
body.description: If even and perfectly cushioned support strikes your fancy, then the Foam and Spring Mattress is your ticket to many well-rested mornings to come. Featuring a fiber quilted cover, CertiPUR-US Certified high-density and Viscolatex foams, and a base layer of heavy duty steel innersprings, this mattress is equipped with the right blend to let your joints and spine rest comfortably. With a touch of enveloping softness from our Viscolatex foam backed by reliable traditional innersprings, this mattress is especially ideal for stomach sleepers and those who enjoy a reactive feel. Rolled and shipped in a box that arrives at your doorstep with a 10-year worry-free warranty in tow, it’s equipped with just about everything you need to enjoy smooth snoozing. So all that’s left for you to do is tuck in and close your eyes, no sheep-counting required.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Complete your bedroom Foam and Spring Mattress Swirl Gel Cooling Topper SmartBase(R) Tool-Free Materials Zinus Comfort Foam(R), Steel Support Coils Materials Swirl gel memory foam Materials Steel Firmness Medium Assembly Unbox and decompress 48 - 72 hrs Assembly No tools needed, under 10 min Available profiles 6, 8, 10, 12" Available profiles 1.5, 2, 3, 4" Available sizes Narrow twin, twin, twin XL, Full, Queen, King, Cal king

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars WAY TOO FIRM. Would not recommend.
reviews.reviewText: This mattress is not medium/firm. It is Firm/FIRM. I generally prefer my mattresses on the firmer feel but this is like sleeping on a wooden plank with fabric on it. I’m a 20 year old who can fall asleep anywhere, yet, I find it difficult on this piece of chemical smelling metal. Btw, it smells like helium tastes. It’s been a week now since I’ve bought it and I let it air out for 24 hours, etc but it still smells. The smell has taken over my whole bedroom, and at what cost? Certainly not the cost of a goods night sleep.I wish I had not bought this mattress.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very comfortable and made of quality materials. You can tell it’s built to last. Quality mattress for the price and easy to assemble. Perfect for a teenager, college aged, young adult or spare bedroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2018
reviews.reviewText: Has a chemical smell to it but I’m hoping that will go away with time. Aside from that, I don’t really have any complaints. It’s comfortable and I’m satisfied with my purchase.UPDATE: Didn’t even make it to a full year before I noticed mold growing inside of the mattress. Would never recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Super super super soft and not for adults - not aligned with product description

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Most UNCOMFORTABLE mattress ever
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely awful. Uncomfortable and creaks. Terrible. Do NOT waste your time or money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great buy. Great fit for full size frame.
reviews.reviewText: Product was delivered timely and easy to unpack. Fits a full size bed as promised. It’s firm but soft and comfortable. I weigh 200lbs and although this bed/mattress is for my son (weights 70lbs) everyday/night use, it’s sturdy enough for me (I’ve slept on it a few times). Haven’t experienced any parts of the mattress sinking or drooping of the sides. I Would recommend this item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not very comfortable
reviews.reviewText: Bought the 10 inch version - Might be good for a young child- but this 'hybrid" is all springs. I bought 3 different mattresses on Amazon to replace/upgraded in our home and this one is the only had choice. I picked based on reviews and am sadly disappointed. Springs creak when you move which woke me up several times. It reminds me of the old mattress I replaced with this one. Beware there is no real foam layer and you can feel every spring. Definitely not a hybrid mattress like the other one I got. This one is like a trampoline with the springs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Very disappointed in this product and am frustrated because how do ...
reviews.reviewText: This mattress is not as firm as the other product reviews had stated. And there is a musty smell that won’t go away. Very disappointed in this product and am frustrated because how do you repackage a fold up mattress to return it if you’re dissatisfied? Guess it’s the price you pay for inexpensive products.
Muy buen colchón , súper cómodo , lo recomiendo ampliamente

I purchased this mattress for my 4 year old daughter. She really needed a new one!Pros:1. It came packaged extremely well! Almost vacuumed sealed, in a way. Be careful when you're opening the packaging, and ensure all young children and pets are not nearby, as it unravels with some force. Even I had to move back a bit!2. It's comfortable, and slightly buoyant. It's extremely attractive as well. I almost fell asleep on my baby girl's bed!!3. My daughter will undoubtedly be able to grow into this bed. I can tell it was made to last. She can have this mattress for years to come!4. The price is pretty good, for what it is!Cons:1. Shipping. I requested for this mattress to be delivered to me the day after I ordered it, since I'm a Prime member. That did not happen. Puralator gave SO many issues. Claiming they tried to deliver when they definitely didn't. I ended up having to pick it up at a local Puralator Depot, 3 days after it was supposed to be delivered. Extremely inconvenient. I had to take a Uber there, and a taxi back, since it comes in a pretty big and long box. Puralator has long since been known for horrendous service. So, I'm not saying everyone will have this experience. I live in a building, if that helps anyone. I know it's the Holiday Season but if I chose a package to be delivered the day after, it should be!! Amazon compensated me for my troubles.2. The mattress does have a strong smell. Not a disgusting smell, but a prominent NEW smell. I'd be good to let it air out for a while, in the bedroom with an open window. My fiance loved the smell. He said this is what a new mattress should smell like. I laughed, but since it's for our 4 year old, we decided to let it air out a bit.All in all, I truly love this mattress for my daughter. Her eyes lit up when she saw it. She knew she was getting a new bed, so she was definitely anticipating it, but when I walked through the door with the box, and when she saw the actual mattress with her own eyes, I felt so happy to see she was happy! We won't have to worry about getting her a new bed for YEARS now, which is awesome. I recommend this bed for anyone that has children (4-5 years and up, I would say), single people, students/professionals, etc. If you're thinking about getting this bed for you and your partner, I'd wish against that. The bed is good for maybe 2 kids at a time, or just 1 adult. But two adults at a time would be very uncomfortable and cramped. I wish you all enjoy your new purchase!

I needed an upgrade for my old bed, eventually I found this and decided to try it, for the price I was skeptical but honestly I am super surprised!I wanted to downgrade to a Twin since I needed more room, it came vacuum sealed in a box, and rather light. Just make sure to open it away from anything, somewhere empty, while mine did not there is a chance it can shoot open and injure someone!But the price to comfort ratio is insane. I was going into this purchase thinking its not really going to be very worth the price but would suffice for the time until I could save up for a expensive bed but honestly, I don't see me getting rid of this anytime soon.Its comfortable, can't say I had any bad sleeps on it, it does come with springs. Almost a decade ago now I used to sleep on some cheap queen spring mattress and it was awful, it had only been a few months old and it was SUPER squeaky, like unbearable with every little movement. But this mattress is very quiet!Also seems like it does not matter if you sleep on your side, back or stomach, all are comfortable!So should you get it? Sure! If you are looking for something temporary or even a long term, this will easily do the job no problem! Maybe there are some better mattresses for the same or similar price, but if you just need something that will be nice to sleep on this will do just fine!
Excelente para camas infantiles no creo sea muy bueno para alguien que supere 50 KilosEs muy ligero y cómodo.
